body: You broaden your study of weapons to encompass multiple similar weapons.
name: Martial Mastery
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Humans/New Racial Rules/Human Feats/Martial Mastery

sections.body: Each combat feat you have that applies to a specific weapon (e.g., Weapon Focus) can be used with all weapons in the same weapon group.
sections.name: Benefit
